text: Fyodor Fyodorovich Cherenkov () (25 July 1959 — 4 October 2014) was a Soviet and Russian football midfielder. He played for Spartak Moscow (1977–90 and 1991–94) and Red Star Football Club (1990–91). Cherenkov made 34 appearances for USSR national football team, scoring 12 goals. He was born in Moscow, Russia. Cherenkov died in Moscow, Russia, aged 55. ==References== ==Other websites== * Fyodor Cherenkov's profile at Spartak's official website * Profile and interview Category:1959 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Footballers from Moscow
title: Fyodor Cherenkov
